sim/operation/make_current_aircraft_icon.description: (Re)generate all icons for the current aircraft.

sim/operation/make_single_icon.description: (Re)generate the icon for the current aircraft & livery.

sim/operation/make_missing_icons.description: Generate all missing aircraft & livery icons.

sim/operation/cycle_dump.description: Print out a cycle dump for this frame.

sim/operation/test_data_ref.description: Test dataref: Run from 0 to 1 and back.

sim/operation/reload_aircraft.description: Force reloading the current aircraft (including art).

sim/operation/reload_aircraft_no_art.description: Force reloading the current aircraft (skip art reload).

sim/operation/close_windows.description: Close any windows to get back to cockpit.

sim/map/show_instructor_operator_station.description: Toggle the instructor operator station (IOS) window.

sim/operation/toggle_data_output_graph.description: Toggle display of the data output graph.

sim/operation/toggle_weather_map.description: Toggle display of the weather map.

sim/operation/toggle_data_output_cockpit.description: Toggle display of the cockpit data output.

sim/operation/toggle_joy_profiles_window.description: Toggle the keyboard & joystick profiles window.

sim/operation/toggle_style_guide.description: Toggle display of the V11 UI style guide.

sim/flight_controls/cowl_flaps_closed.description: Move cowl flaps to closed a bit.
